translations.translation: Manage your vRack

Manage the private connection of all your infrastructure components, all over the globe.
vRack technology (virtual bay) enables you to connect, isolate or distribute your services within one or multiple private and secure networks.
You can also change owner if you need to.
Description of your vRack
For more information, see our guide.
Change the owner
Oops, we were unable to retrieve your vRack data.
Oops, there was an error while adding a service to your vRack.
Oops, there was an error while deleting a service from your vRack.
Your eligible services
Your vRack
Select one or more services to add to or delete from your vRack:
Create your vRack

Warning, it is still not possible to get cloud products to communicate with other types of products. However this will be enabled over the next few months. For the moment communication is only possible inside the same project.
Name cannot exceed {{ max }} characters.
The name must start with a letter and cannot have any spaces.
Edit description of this vRack
Edit name of this vRack
Add a description for this vRack
Click to add a description for this vRack
Discard changes made to the description
Discard changes made to the name
Save changes made to the description
Save changes made to name
Description cannot exceed {{ max }} characters.
Characters used: {{ count }} / {{ max }}
vm-network
Moving a Private Cloud datacentre
You selected a Private Cloud datacentre. This service cannot stand on its own and must be moved to another vRack.
This operation will cause 5 minutes service disruption.
Destination vRack:
Select a vRack
Oops... the datacentre migration has failed.
